first_translate: you're too good of a person...
second_translate: Is it right to be shaken like this by just one thought from my boyfriend...?
label: it would be a shame to see a girl of your caliber get shaken...

first_translate: ...to be shaken up by what your boyfriend thinks.
label: ...by what your boyfriend thinks.

first_translate: but are you and siegren just dating?
second_translate: Are you and Siegren just dating?
label: but are you and siegren just dating?

hangle: 약혼이나 결혼 생각은 아직 없는 거고?
first_translate: have you thought about getting engaged or married?
second_translate: You don't have any plans to get engaged or married yet, right?
label: are you thinking of getting engaged or married yet?

first_translate: why are you suddenly asking that?
second_translate: Why do you ask that all of a sudden?
label: but why do you ask?

first_translate: it's just that your relationship with siegren seems a bit ambiguous.
second_translate: it's just that your relationship with Siegren seems a bit ambiguous.
label: it just seems like your relationship with siegren is a bit vague.

hangle: 틀어지면 곤란한 사이라 적당히 사귀고 있는 건가?
first_translate: I was wondering if you were dating him casually because it would be bad if you broke up.
second_translate: I thought you might be dating him casually because it would be troublesome if things went wrong.
label: I was thinking maybe you two weren’t seeing each other seriously because...
...it would be a problem if things didn’t work out.
...do you feel like being with him is a bit too much?

first_translate: it's not that siegren is burdensome.
second_translate: It's not that Siegren is overwhelming.
label: I wouldn’t say being with siegren is overwhelming.
just get mad at me instead!

hangle: 오히려 시그렌에 대한 내 마음이 좀 그래.
first_translate: it's more about how I feel about him.
second_translate: Rather, it's my feelings for Siegren that are complicated.
label: it’s just that my feelings for siegren are changing.

second_translate: More and more as time goes by,
label: with each passing day,

hangle: 시그렌을 갖고 싶다고 생각하는 내 마음이.
first_translate: I find myself wanting him more and more.
second_translate: I keep thinking about wanting to have Siegren.
label: I find myself wanting him more and more.

first_translate: if you ask me if it's burdensome,
second_translate: If you ask whether it's burdensome,
label: ...when you ask me whether or not being with him is too much,

second_translate: I guess you could say that.
label: I guess... you could put it that way.

first_translate: a few days later, in the capital
second_translate: a few days later, in the capital
label: a few days later at the capital

first_translate: I heard you did a great job.
second_translate: I heard you made a great contribution.
label: we heard you made quite an achievement.

hangle: 나, 왜 갑자기 이렇게 인기가 폭발하는 거야!!
first_translate: why is my popularity skyrocketing all of a sudden?!
second_translate: Why is my popularity skyrocketing all of a sudden?!
label: why am I suddenly so popular?!

hangle: 혹시… 영애가 제가 한 일에 대해서 이야기하셨나요?
first_translate: did you... tell them about what I did?
second_translate: My Lady, did you by any chance talk about what I did?
label: did you tell everyone about what I did?

first_translate: I told you I would help you, right?
second_translate: I told you I'd help, didn't I?
label: I told you I'd help, didn't I?

hangle: 갑자기 이런 시선을 받는 것도 부담스러운데요.
first_translate: it's a bit overwhelming to suddenly receive this kind of attention.
second_translate: It's a bit overwhelming to suddenly be the center of attention.
label: it’s quite overwhelming to suddenly be the center of attention.

first_translate: you'll have to get used to it, my lady.
second_translate: You'll have to get used to it, my lady.
label: you have to get used to it, lady fiona,

hangle: 앞으론 우리가 이렇게 사교계를 제패할 테니까.
second_translate: From now on, we'll dominate high society.
label: because this is how we're going to conquer high society from now on.

first_translate: wait, this is getting too big.
second_translate: Wait a second, the scale suddenly got bigger!
label: hang on, when did things take on such a big scale?

hangle: 기왕 태어난 거 꿈은 크게 가져야죠.
first_translate: since we're born anyway, we might as well dream big.
second_translate: Since we're born anyway, we might as well dream big.
label: if we're going to dream, we should dream big.

first_translate: I was wondering if you were dating him casually...
second_translate: Because it would be troublesome if things went wrong...
label: is it true that we’re worried about what would happen if we break up,

first_translate: ...because it would be bad if you broke up.
label: so we’re not dating seriously?

first_translate: I'm fine. I'm all better now.
second_translate: I'm fine. I'm all better now.
label: I'm fine. I'm all better now.

first_translate: I want to talk to you after this dance.
label: we need to talk after this dance.

second_translate: Should we do it right now?
label: ..do you want to talk right here and now?

first_translate: put me down. people are watching...!
second_translate: Put me down... People are watching!
label: just put me down. people are looking!
somewhere quiet where we can talk.

first_translate: I have a bad feeling about this...
second_translate: I have a bad feeling about this...
label: I'm getting a bad feeling about this...

first_translate: maybe we should have gone inside.

first_translate: I don't want to go to your room.

first_translate: I wasn't going to take you there.

first_translate: your feet will hurt if you stand for too long.

first_translate: is this going to take a long time?
second_translate: Is this going to take long?
